column3: so nobody move there's blood on the floor and i can't find my heart so where did it go did i leave it in the cold so please give it back 'cause it's not yours to take it must've fell when i lost my mind so deep in the cut drowning in a pain somebody help 'cause i can't find my way nobody move nobody move   so somebody tell me how i'm supposed to feel when i'm sitting here knowing this ain't real i've been traveling so long i don't think i can hold on so where were you when i needed you the most why in the hell would i give my heart to you just to watch you throw it in the trash so now i'm sitting here with a black hole in my chest a heartless broken mess
